mapper.select: select T.theater_name,T.zip,#{Date} as date from movie_theater MT,theater T, where MT.theater_id = T.theater_id and M.movie_id=MT.movie_id and theater_name like #{Theatername} and T.zip = #{Zipcode} and from_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{Date}, '%m/%d/%Y') AND to_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{Date}, '%m/%d/%Y')
